about_the_game:
Unlock 185 puzzles depicting buildings and landmarks -- from seaside villages and crumbling castles to gleaming cities and architectural masterpieces!

These buildings are found throughout the world, but you can make these puzzles from the comfort of your home, on your own or with friends and family.

Among the many structures represented you'll find:

The Eiffel Tower
Hong Kong skyline
New York City bridges
Dutch windmills
The waterways of Venice
Rural farm buildings
Castles
Cathedrals
The Parthenon
Big Ben
...and many dozens more!

In addition to unlocking 185 unique puzzles, this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

This pack combines the Puzzle Together packages "Buildings", "Landmarks", and "Museum Architecture". This is a $32.97 value if purchased individually in-game -- plus you'll receive $3.99 worth of puzzle credits.

Snuggle up by the fireplace, pick a beautiful building and enjoy some relaxing puzzle time!

Here are just a few of the puzzle images included in this pack:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: ARMv7 with Neon Support (32-bit) or ARM64

In addition to unlocking 185 unique puzzles (a $32.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.
